00001 #include <System/Event.h>
00002 #include <System/SimpleException.h>
00003 
00004 #include <errno.h>
00005 
00006 using namespace Omiscid;
00007 
00009 Event::Event()
00010 {
00011 #ifndef WIN32
00012     if(pthread_mutex_init(&mutex, NULL) != 0)
00013         throw SimpleException("Error Mutex Init");
00014     if(pthread_cond_init(&condition, NULL) != 0)
00015         throw SimpleException("Error Condition Init");
00016 #else
00017     if((handle = CreateEvent(NULL, TRUE, FALSE, NULL)) == NULL)
00018         throw  SimpleException("Error CreateEvent");
00019 #endif /* WIN32 */
00020 }
00021 
00023 Event::~Event()
00024 {
00025 #ifndef WIN32
00026     pthread_cond_destroy(&condition);
00027     pthread_mutex_destroy(&mutex);
00028 #else
00029     CloseHandle(handle);
00030 #endif /* WIN32 */
00031 }
00032 
00034 void Event::Signal()
00035 {
00036 #ifndef WIN32
00037     pthread_mutex_lock(&mutex);
00038     pthread_cond_broadcast(&condition);
00039     pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex);
00040 #else
00041     SetEvent(handle);
00042 #endif /* WIN32 */
00043 }
00044 
00049 void Event::Reset()
00050 {
00051 #ifdef WIN32
00052     ResetEvent(handle);
00053 #endif
00054 }
00055 
00063 bool Event::Wait(unsigned long timer)
00064 {
00065 #ifndef WIN32
00066     pthread_mutex_lock(&mutex);
00067     if(timer == 0)
00068     {
00069         pthread_cond_wait(&condition, &mutex);
00070         pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex);
00071         return true;
00072     }
00073     else
00074     {
00075         struct timeval now;
00076         struct timespec timeout;
00077         int retcode;
00078 
00079         int second = timer/1000;
00080         int nanos = (timer-second*1000)*1000000;
00081 
00082         gettimeofday(&now, NULL);
00083 
00084         // Compute time until where we must wait
00085         timeout.tv_sec = now.tv_sec + second;
00086         timeout.tv_nsec = now.tv_usec * 1000 + nanos;
00087         // If nano is over 1 s, remove it. Shoud appear only once but put a while...
00088         while ( timeout.tv_nsec > 1000000000 )
00089         {
00090             timeout.tv_nsec -= 1000000000;
00091             timeout.tv_sec  += 1;
00092         }
00093 
00094         retcode = pthread_cond_timedwait(&condition, &mutex, &timeout);
00095         pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex);
00096 
00097         return (retcode == 0);
00098     }
00099 #else
00100     if ( timer == 0 )
00101     {
00102         for(;;)
00103         {
00104             int ret = WaitForSingleObject(handle, INFINITE);
00105             switch( ret )
00106             {
00107                 case WAIT_TIMEOUT:
00108                     continue;
00109 
00110                 case WAIT_OBJECT_0:
00111                     return true;
00112 
00113                 default:
00114                     return false;
00115             }
00116         }
00117     }
00118     else
00119     {
00120         if ( WaitForSingleObject(handle, timer) == WAIT_OBJECT_0 )
00121         {
00122             // We've got it !
00123             return true;
00124         }
00125         return false;
00126     }
00127 #endif
00128 }
